data.text:
――So, let's all go to the Moon Viewing Social together! 
And I'll help out with your training!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>――So, let's all go to the Moon Viewing Social together! 
<story>And I'll help out with your training!

data.text: The Moon Viewing Social...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>The Moon Viewing Social...

data.text:
I, um, I'm sorry. 
For making you do so much for me..
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I, um, I'm sorry. 
<story>For making you do so much for me..

data.text: No, no! It's no problem! Let's all have a good time!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: No, no! It's no problem! Let's all have a good time!

data.text: Taiki Shuttle―― Today's plan―― here.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>Taiki Shuttle―― Today's plan―― here.

data.text: Okay! Let's get right to it!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Okay! Let's get right to it!

data.text:
Good job, Rob Roy! 
Let's give our best tomorrow, too!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Good job, Rob Roy! 
<story>Let's give our best tomorrow, too!!

data.text: I will! Thank you so much, both of you...!!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>I will! Thank you so much, both of you...!!

data.text:
(...Now even Taiki-san is coaching me... But my pace has not 
improved by much. I've truly stalled out...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(...Now even Taiki-san is coaching me... But my pace has not 
<story>improved by much. I've truly stalled out...)

data.text: .................I'm so sorry, both of you...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>.................I'm so sorry, both of you...

data.text: ――The next day.
data.processed: <story>――The next day.

data.text:
I have five minutes until we're scheduled to start... 
I should take the time to warm up.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I have five minutes until we're scheduled to start... 
<story>I should take the time to warm up.

data.text:
(――I'm going to put up results today. I need to be faster than I 
was yesterday, even just a little...!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(――I'm going to put up results today. I need to be faster than I 
<story>was yesterday, even just a little...!)

data.text: ! Uni-san, hello――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>! Uni-san, hello――

data.text:
"GIVU". 
『Towels』『Ice Packs』『Rations』and『Candy』are also 
included.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"GIVU". 
<story>『Towels』『Ice Packs』『Rations』and『Candy』are also 
<story>included.

data.text: Whaat!? You're giving me... all this!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Whaat!? You're giving me... all this!?

data.text:
Um, Uni-san...! I'm very grateful for all this, but I, well, 
I feel like I'm taking too much from you――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Um, Uni-san...! I'm very grateful for all this, but I, well, 
<story>I feel like I'm taking too much from you――

data.text:
"Neutrino." 
We are "ZEER". So this is "only natural".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"Neutrino." 
<story>We are "ZEER". So this is "only natural".

data.text: Well... But if I don't do anything for you in return, I...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Well... But if I don't do anything for you in return, I...

data.text:
――? Is it still "unwanted"? 
..."Support" is a complex task. Scheduling reassessment.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>――? Is it still "unwanted"? 
<story>..."Support" is a complex task. Scheduling reassessment.

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah... 
<story>...

data.text: Hiii, Rob Roy! Let's give it our... Oh? Look at all this stuff! You're really prepared!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Hiii, Rob Roy! Let's give it our... Oh? Look at all this stuff! You're really prepared!

data.text:
Oh, these... 
Actually, Uni-san dropped them off just a moment ago...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Oh, these... 
<story>Actually, Uni-san dropped them off just a moment ago...

data.text: Universe did?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Universe did?

data.text:
Yes. She's been spoiling me quite a bit recently... 
Taking race notes for me, giving me snacks and drinks... 
I've been getting too much from her.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Yes. She's been spoiling me quite a bit recently... 
<story>Taking race notes for me, giving me snacks and drinks... 
<story>I've been getting too much from her.

data.text:
I wish there was something I could do in return. 
I'm not sure what to do...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I wish there was something I could do in return. 
<story>I'm not sure what to do...

data.text: Well~... Hmm, giving back to a friend... Oh! I know a tool-proof plan! You can vet your life on it!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Well~... Hmm, giving back to a friend... Oh! I know a tool-proof plan! You can vet your life on it!

data.text:
(...The reason I'm not improving must be because I'm too quick 
to run out of stamina. I should run just a bit more...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(...The reason I'm not improving must be because I'm too quick 
<story>to run out of stamina. I should run just a bit more...)

data.text: ――Uni-san?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>――Uni-san?

data.text: "GIVU". A PM "resupply".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>"GIVU". A PM "resupply".

data.text:
Th-thank you so much, like always...! 
――Oh, Uni-san, wait!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Th-thank you so much, like always...! 
<story>――Oh, Uni-san, wait!

data.text: Let's... let's go out together!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Let's... let's go out together!

data.text: ...『Go out』?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>...『Go out』?

data.text: Here's my tool-proof plan for giving back to a friend. Just get right to it and go out together!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Here's my tool-proof plan for giving back to a friend. Just get right to it and go out together!

data.text: Going out with a friend makes you super happy! Getting her a present when you're there is a good idea too! Enjoy your time together, it'll all work out!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Going out with a friend makes you super happy! Getting her a present when you're there is a good idea too! Enjoy your time together, it'll all work out!

data.text:
(I'll take Uni-san to a place she'll enjoy, just like Taiki-san told 
me. In the best case scenario, I'll be able to buy her something... 
...That way I'll be able to return the favor ――!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I'll take Uni-san to a place she'll enjoy, just like Taiki-san told 
<story>me. In the best case scenario, I'll be able to buy her something... 
<story>...That way I'll be able to return the favor ――!)

data.text:
(...Aauuughh, wait, isn't it rude to just invite her out like this!? 
What do I do? Uhhh...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(...Aauuughh, wait, isn't it rude to just invite her out like this!? 
<story>What do I do? Uhhh...)

data.text: That is... If you're available, of course, time permitting...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>That is... If you're available, of course, time permitting...

data.text:
――Affirmative. 
Any time will be "JST".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>――Affirmative. 
<story>Any time will be "JST".
